an5.165:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi …pe… “yo hi koci, avuso, param panham pucchati, sabbo so pancahi thanehi, etesam va annatarena.
an5.165:1.3: Mandatta momuhatta param panham pucchati, papiccho icchapakato param panham pucchati, paribhavam param panham pucchati, annatukamo param panham pucchati, atha va panevamcitto param panham pucchati:
an5.165:1.4: ‘sace me panham puttho sammadeva byakarissati iccetam kusalam, no ce me panham puttho sammadeva byakarissati ahamassa sammadeva byakarissami’ti.
an5.165:1.5: Yo hi koci, avuso, param panham pucchati, sabbo so imehi pancahi thanehi, etesam va annatarena.
an5.165:1.6: Aham kho panavuso, evamcitto param panham pucchami:
an5.165:1.7: ‘sace me panham puttho sammadeva byakarissati iccetam kusalam, no ce me panham puttho sammadeva byakarissati, ahamassa sammadeva byakarissami’”ti.
